price: ហើយពួកដែលគ្មានជំនឿនឹងអាយ៉ាត់ៗរបស់យើង ពួក គេគឺជាពួកដែលទទួលបញ្ជីដោយដៃឆេ្វង។
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyātinā hum aṣḥābu al-mashamati
